body_html:
Same here also on centos 7. And I've tried with gcc 4.9 from SCL with same (bad) result.
Cuda 7.5 (/usr/local/cuda-7.5)
Cudnn 5.1.3 (which is installed in my home folder, as tell to th configure script)
